title: Whats a good build for Riven
body: I just got Riven and i'm  wondering what build is good for a newbie riven player??{{champion:92}} {{item:3074}}

replies.body:
Doran's Blade, Boots, Brutalizer (before boots if you can but boots are safe), Upgrade to Mercs/tabi/Cdr boots if no CC or heavy AD Laner (tabi is good if Trynd top and they have an adc especially if they're auto based and not a caster) (Mercs if there are 3-4 or more crowd controls) (Mainly nercs if they have a fair bit of magic damage too), Ravenous Hydra, Last Whisper, Black Cleaver, Upgrade to Youmuu's, Build Guardian Angel (Guardian Angel before Youmuu's if you need).

That's a pretty basic setup, I mean Quicksilver Sash after Brut if they have like Malz or Mordekaiser Top then try to go for a bloodthirster (It's a pretty easy lane against morde).

Hitting 40% Cdr is great. Armor pen is necessary. Get as much AD as you can really because you get defense out of it (her shield scales out of AD).

Hydra lets you wave push so if you don't need to go for Bloodthirster.

Boxbox (pro riven player) basically just rushes Hydra even before boots whenever he can because it provides a nice mix of stats then builds Last Whisper and usually goes for CDR boots but goes mercs or tabi depending on matchups etc.

TP flash is pretty good if you're just starting as its good for hard matchups but ignite is great and I personally like Azubu Frosts strategy of taking heal and ignite.

{{summoner:7}} {{summoner:14}} Well Riven does have 4 dashes...
I take Heal and Ignite on {{champion:266}} I do well if the enemy takes teleport and flash, if they take ignite then I have a bit of a harder time.

You should search up "how to animation cancel riven" on google.
It's a skill that all Riven players have to learn. If done perfectly you're pretty much the most oppressive AD toplaner.

i'm not a riven player but a good person to learn from is boxbox.

he gas a twitch and youtube channel.
